title: NBCC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Assistant Manager Posts
text: NBCC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Assistant Manager Posts NBCC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Assistant Manager Posts: Government of India Enterprise, National Buildings Construction Corporation NBCC (India) Limited has issued a notification for the recruitment of Assistant Manager (Company secretary) vacancies on regular basis through direct recruitment. Eligible candidates can apply online from 10.00 hrs on 04-03-2017 to 23.59 hrs on 03-04-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below… NBCC Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Assistant Manager (Company secretary) Age Limit: Candidates upper age should be 30 years as on closing date of online application. Age relaxation is as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should be Qualified Company Secretary (Associate Company Secretary) with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written test only. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 1000/- (non-refundable) through online using debit card/ credit card/ net-banking. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can apply online through the website www.nbccindia.com from 10.00 hrs on 04-03-2017 to 23.59 hrs on 03-04-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid e-mail id & scanned copies of all relevant certificates. 2. Log on to www.nbccindia.com 3. Click on “HRM—>Careers@NBCC”. 4. Select the desired post & click on it. 5. Read the instructions carefully & Click on “Apply Online”. 6. Fill the details & Submit the form. 7. Take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date & Time for Online Application From 10.00 hrs on 04-03-2017 Last Date & Time for Online Application 23.59 hrs on 03-04-2017 Last date of Remittance of application process Charges/ fee in Bank (for already registered candidates only) 04-04-2017 Last date of Submission of Payment details in Online Portal (for registered candidates only) 04-04-2017 by 23.45 hrs For more details like experience, scale of pay, general instructions & other information click on the link given below….
